From Wiktionary, the free dictionary
See also: politik and pólitík

German

[edit]
German Wikipedia has an article on:
Politik
Wikipedia de

Etymology

[edit]

From French politique.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /poliˈtiːk/, /poliˈtɪk/
  • Audio (Germany (Berlin)):(file)
  • Rhymes: -iːk, -ɪk
  • Hyphenation: Po‧li‧tik

Noun

[edit]

Politik f (genitive Politik, plural Politiken)

  1. politics
  2. policy

Declension

[edit]
Declension of Politik [feminine]
singular plural
indef. def. noun def. noun
nominative eine die Politik die Politiken
genitive einer der Politik der Politiken
dative einer der Politik den Politiken
accusative eine die Politik die Politiken

Hunsrik

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /p(ʰ)oliˈtiːk/

Noun

[edit]

Politik f

  1. politics
    Deer ferstehd nichs iwer Politik?
    You don't understand anything about politics?

Further reading

[edit]
  • Boll, Piter Kehoma (2021), “Politik”, in Dicionário Hunsriqueano Riograndense–Português, 3rd edition (overall work in Portuguese), Ivoti: Riograndenser Hunsrickisch
